body:
A question for leaders and startup people:

How do you talk to your customers/teammates? Like specifically how do you get over the anxiety and vulnerability and imperfection that comes with asking for feedback from people?

Any tips are appreciated.

#MondaySales tip:
"I just need a price." "To much money!" "I have to talk to my partner" etc these are ALL defensive responses or complaints untill further validated. Handle it! 😉-#AlexVerdea

#sales #salestips #salestraining #money  #com #startups

I'll give early stage startups an AWS tip. 

Make Lightsail containers if you wanna do the Linuxy stuff yourself. Make Lambda functions if you like serverless. 

Don't try to use any of the other 999 AWS services. Focus on learning your market instead of learning AWS.

If you could share one tip for Shark tank pitch what it would be? 📊

#entrepreneur #startups #PitchPerfect
Any esports elementary/middle school school teams that have an idea of “startup” costs or materials? Grateful for any tips. @stumpteacher @jkdncn @thenerdyteacher

If you would offer one tip to a start-up business, it would be...
Over to you Twitter! @EnterprisingYou #startup #businessowner

Founders, I'm working with @nishithshah on setting up a discussion soon on Effective Remote Work for Startups. Do you have tips to share? Perhaps you have questions? Do share.

@punestartups

If you take these qualities into consideration, you have set out on the path to picking the right co-founder for your startup.

Do you have any more tips on the topic? Please go ahead to share them in the comments section below.

#FCMB #MyBankAndI #FCMBSupportsTech

Pro startup tips 🚀

Work 25 hours a day. 
Stop breathing, it’s a waste of time.
More jargon, more growth.
Wear adult diapers to maximise productivity.
Holidays are for losers.
Write Twitter Tips.
Neglect your wife and young kids.

Don’t buy a fan to avoid shit hitting the fan🚀

Have an auction startup tomorrow...

Anybody want to drop some tips so I don't ruin my team? ⬇️

Startup founders are always facing a myriad of problems & opportunities - which means infinite options to consider.

Tip from a mentor: the art of entrepreneurship is in perfecting how you choose what NOT to do instead of perfecting what you've chosen TO do.
Signed up for Y-Combinator startup school today. Thanks @sahilypatel for the tip.

Random Tip: Cryptocurrency is like a startup, before investing study what the company is doing... 

#Crypto
Thinking about writing a startup guide for HRPT. Any suggestions on what I should include, or perhaps some tips or personal experiences?

TIP: Some of the best #crypto buys are those legit startups with longterm utility/value and great teams/tech that have been gradually dumped by early investors. Often price recovery leads to new price discovery in such instances after the early investor dump sequence is complete.

Pro startup tip: 

Start documenting everything, whatsapp chats and emails can get you good press not fast judgement in the court 😅
Job Tip No One Asked For: do not apply to anything digital or startup related with a hotmail email
How many non-US startups read/watch lots of US startup tips, but then find that these don’t apply well to their own home ecosystems?
hey, any tips for someone that wishes to be a startup CEO one day? #AskingForAFriend #startups
